comment: There is a lot of homework but she cancels class most of the time so just make sure to keep up with the weekly assignments and the connect work. Overall really no reason to not have an A in this class.

I think her last name changed to Smith. Professor Smith is so sweet and kind. She keeps the class interactive by doing group activities. She does assign a lot of homework but she does give 2 weeks to do it which helps with the final grade. She cares about her students so just communicate with her and she will help. Take her!

Awesome professor and she truly cares about her students and wants them to succeed. No late credit for homework so don't make my mistake and forget the first due date for homework and your almost guaranteed an A.
Professor McMahon was great! There was a lot of homework, and while attendance wasn't mandatory, it does help a lot with the final grade.

Really nice teacher. Easy homework. Stressful when she doesn't submit grades, tell you exactly when the tests are or respond to emails.  But i learned a lot and she's really nice.  if lack of clarity doesn't stress you out, definitely take her! easy A but a little stressful.

Overall great professor! Class participation is required. Homework assignments are very time consuming. She willing to work with you to assist you in Spanish. Project and final at end of semester. Attendance is mandatory.

profe tara is wonderful. class was easy and she very much showed her dedication in trying to get you to understand spanish. she tries to keep class fun with interactive lessons. she was amazing and i would absolutely take her again. she is a very slow grader though. i didn't really know my grade or where i was at until near the very end.
Take someone else, if you don't want to read the textbook or take 35 question test under 20 minutes!
I recommend taking this professor because she will help you with anything. I struggle in Spanish, but I made any A in her class.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: this professor is super nice and genuinely such a good person. she also makes her lessons fun and interesting. homework can be kinda tedious especially the connect assignments. however, the work isnt too hard as long as you get everything done

Sweetest lady ever. Genuinely cares about you and your success & understanding. So funny and energetic. Do everything you can to take her if you're not great at spanish. Even if you are, this class will just be that much easier. Material is easy and she makes it fun.

Professor Tara is such a gem! She is so sweet and caring! She gives very specific feedback and its so clear she wants the best for her students. Her lessons are very thorough without being overwhelming. She's such a fun professor! She is a little slow to respond to emails, but she'll never let that affect your grade. Take her if you're able to!!
Take this one for 2003 Online. Just trust me
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: Profe Tara is real gem. She always includes dog pics in her powerpoint slides. She makes the class super fun and includes everyone - you make friends fast in her class. Lots of opportunity for points by participating and doing homework. Definitely a fun class to take. A little slow to respond to email and slow to grade but overall love this prof!

This teacher is amazing! An her class is an easy A+. The only thing is, the homework could be the death of your grade if you wait at the last minute to complete. Another downside is since this class is an accelerated class she does move rather quick, I used her class as a guideline and went to YouTube, lol YouTube actually taught me.
She is amazing , the sweetest teacher at Kennesaw . The textbook homework is the only thing that was difficult to me , her tests are simple .

By far the nicest and most caring professor Ive ever had. Her online homework was challenging but she genuinely cares about her students and wants them to do well. She gives extra credit opportunities and there is a project at the end of the semester.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Profe Tara was wonderful. She makes spanish fun to learn. Would definitely recommend. You can miss two classes with no penalty, but after that, every absence is a point off from your final grade.
